mapper.select: SELECT qlpr.*,qlp.projName FROM ql_ProjCust_Ref qlpr JOIN ql_Project qlp ON qlpr.projId = qlp.id WHERE qlpr.custId = #{userId}
select * from ql_ProjCust_Ref where custId=#{cusId} and projId = #{projId}
